articles.description: The Apple iPhone SE 2022, with the A15 Bionic chip and able to upgrade to iOS 17, is on sale from Walmart for $149 after a $230 discount, but there's a catch.
articles.content:
Andy Boxall/Digital Trends / Digital Trends
Apple’s iPhone 15 is already out, but if it’s too expensive, you may want to consider going for the affordable third-generation Apple iPhone SE. It’s curr… [+1888 chars]
